s_synopsis: Chakan was a warrior so confident in his swordsmanship that declared even Death cannot best him in battle. But Death appeared and challenged him: If Chakan won, he would be granted eternal life. However, if Death wins, he will become Death's eternal servant. The battle rages on for several days until Chakan emerges as the victor. Death grants him his reward, but additionally condemns him to wander all of existence until all supernatural evil is destroyed.
